main event: A circular orange object with a green tail was observed over Scott Air Force Base in Illinois on January 3, 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to have no sound,It featured a tail that was ten times the length of its body,The sighting was brief, lasting only 3 seconds,The object climbed gradually at high speed,The observation was categorized as a meteor sighting despite some discussion about other possibilities.
sighted object: circular orange object with a green tail
witness description: James A. Stevens, S/SGT, HQ SQ SEC, TIWG, Scott AFB
